doc:
Peter Pagan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Pagan 0 Peter MacGregor Pagan (24 July 1921 – 2 June 1999) was an Australian-American actor from Sydney best known for his role in The Overlanders (1946). Following the success of that film, he left Australia for England, then moved to the U.S. where he worked extensively in theatre and TV.He became a U.S. citizen in 1954. He died in New York City, age 77. Peter_MacGregor_Pagan ( 24_July_1921 – 2_June_1999 ) was an_Australian-American_actor from Sydney_best known for his_role in The_Overlanders ( 1946 ) . Following the_success of that_film , he left Australia for England , then moved to the_U.S. where he worked extensively in theatre_and_TV.He became a_U.S._citizen in 1954 . He died in New_York_City , age_77 .
